website_summaries.verdict: The Skechers Sparta 2.0 TR gained considerable positive reviews for its comfortable and well-crafted construction, true-to-size measurements, and fashionable design. However, there were those who had problems with the quality as many of the parts easily deteriorated after a few months. The wearers also had clashing views on the fit. While the model was praised for its good fit, some users experienced inconsistencies. It was also deemed uncomfortable during the first couple of uses. Overall, the trainer’s positive qualities still outweighed the negatives, and it was generally considered a good training companion.
pros: A majority of the consumers remarked about the comfortable build of the Skechers Sparta 2.0 TR
Many reviewers noted that the shoe fit as expected
Plenty of fashion-conscious users were amazed at its stylish aesthetics
Numerous testers shared that the trainer seemed to be well made with quality materials and craftsmanship
A few buyers were impressed by the support that this pair of workout shoe provided
Some purchasers thought that it gave good value for what it’s worth
Those who suffered from plantar fasciitis found that the footwear offered pain relief for their condition
cons: Most detractors griped about the model’s lack of durability, with multiple reports of the midsole, upper, outsole, inner lining, and shoelaces breaking down after several months of use
A large number of critics complained about the discomfort that they felt from the shoe and that it required a break-in period before it became comfortable
Various naysayers were conflicted about the fit
some felt that it was too tight and small while others believed that it ran too big
Several testers reported that the outsole had insufficient traction, especially on wet surfaces
A scant amount of criticisms were directed to the shoelaces getting untied easily

customer_reviews.title: Short-term comfort, soals quickly fail.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best feeling shoe for my foot! Why the poor star rating then? Simple, they have a very short wear period... This is my second pair (Amazon replaced the first)... Both pairs The foam springs that support the sole quickly pop out leaving the shoe unwearable. Both pairs have only been lightly worn shoes yet, i had the same problem with both! If you are looking for short-term comfort (lots of support, feels like walking on air) then these may be for you, but don’t plan getting any milage out of them...
customer_reviews.author: br1ght

customer_reviews.title: Wide Open Spaces...
customer_reviews.text: ....in the toe box. Seems to be well-made plus they were half-priced compared to some of the other Skechers sneakers advertised here. Somewhat heavy shoe but doesn't bother me at all for the light duty use they're seeing, meaning walking & standing. For some reason the 10 2E size runs a bit larger than expected. Next time I'll get a 1/2 size smaller, in the wide width that is. Overall, I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RCAV8TOR

customer_reviews.title: Strong rubbed feet.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe at the end of October 2018. After the purchase, I managed to wear them several times. Then the snowy winter came and I switched to a different type of shoe. Now in 2019, it is over in winter. I returned to them again. For several weeks of use, I saw that the shoes are rubbing the heels. I looked at the shoes. It turned out that in those places in the shoes there is a very hard plastic frame. During the use of his shoes, he broke through the fabric and began to cut the leg. With every step I constantly feel pain in the place of contact. I do not recommend to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Oleg Bykov

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit - Comfortable Width
customer_reviews.text: Great fit! Fast delivery. Sketchers knows how to build a comfortable shoe for a wide foot. I ordered too wide shoes a couple times expecting shoe widths as others make. Just a simple wide or 2E as these are work just fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: JDW

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my son that is very picky and the fact that he likes them means a lot to me. He says they are very comfortable. One thing to consider is that I can see how they can collect gravel as other reviews have stated. However, for my son it works just fine because he only wears them for hiking and he does not bring them inside the house :) Therefore, for me it was so worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Glad I ordered this! Fits perfectly and appears to be a long-lasting and sturdy shoe. This is breaking in nicely for walking and my workouts. Will write more later, after I've worn for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: R. Callicotte

customer_reviews.title: The fit is just right.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is hard on shoes. He's been through several brands and finding one that fits right out of the box and meets his needs can sometimes be a challenge. I wore Skechers for years working at the bedside (nursing) and thought Skechers might work for him. I am so glad I ordered them for him. He loves them. The fit is spot on and he raves about how comfortable they are. He loves them so much he ordered a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: GoofingOff

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I liked the wide toe box in these shoes and hope to get a little relief in my tired feet. I never had any problems with the shoes I bought locally, but things have changed recently, so I decided to try out some wide shoes. IMHO these shoes offer normal arch and heel support, but the plus for me was the wide toe box. I'm not sure if the shoes are going to make a difference for my condition, but they are very comfortable, nevertheless.
customer_reviews.author: Crabman

customer_reviews.title: replacement for my favorite New Balance shoes
customer_reviews.text: Work well, thick souls good for working in. Real rubber souls! Hard to find now a days. Not slip resistant though. Have to be careful in wet conditions. personal preference: can they be made in back with neon green trimming?
customer_reviews.author: David and Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Price and Fit are good
customer_reviews.text: price was great, fit is good. the only thing I don't really like about this pair of shoes is the the tread design picks up all kinds of different sized pebbles up to throwing size stones if you walk off pavement. I find myself cleaning them out of the tread and the large size pockets under the heal...if I don't then I then get the "tap shoes" sound when you get back on hard surfaces. Not terrible to deal with but probably enough to keep that 5th star from appearing. I bought these in this color for mostly outdoor yard work and activities.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but are of poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: After just one year these shoes are already falling apart. I had to glue the string holding the front together after just a few months. After about 6-8 months the plastic in the heal started curling, cutting into my heal and shredding the back of the shoe. I have managed to cut it short enough that it's a minor problem. But it should never have been an issue. I walk every where and also get around by bicycle, so my shoes get a lot of wear.
customer_reviews.author: harshbarj

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker, particularly if you have wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and struggle to find sneakers that fit. Usually, the only option is to buy sneakers that are too big, which just ends up hurting. I saw the "roomy" commercial about Skechers and gave these a try. Glad I did. They fit well, offer great insole support, and lace up snug. After years struggling with New Balance, my feet have a new home.
customer_reviews.author: John Tonello

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered a 9 for my husband and when we received them he said they were too big. He wear between an 8.5 and a 9 in shoes, depending on how they are sized. I returned them and ordered the 8.5 size. They fit perfectly! He says they are the most comfortable tennis shoe he's ever owned. I would suggest ordering a half size down from what you regularly wear as I think they run a little large. Look great, feel great, so he's happy!
customer_reviews.author: TexasGoatMomma

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cushioning for the gym
customer_reviews.text: Sketchers doesn't get much attention from the fitness media, but I tried these because I am trying to reduce the pounding on my aging body. I work out about 4-5 times a week and now wear Sketchers (these) to the gym and Sketcher's running shoes on the trails. Both perform well and my body is much happier the next day!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Their size 13 is not size 13 that I buy at all the other retailers.  Too small.
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended to buy shoes, especially from this supplier, unless they have a return policy, and you are willing to jump through hoops to get the right size. I wore them a while, hoping that they might stretch a little, but they didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Brunsting

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase, because the first are so great
customer_reviews.text: I love Skechers because when I get a new pair I can put them on and go out for a 6 mile walk and know they will fit like my last pair .... nothing will bind, rub, abrade. Just fit, and support right. And I get more than 300 miles on a pair (about 3 times what I have gotten on other brands). I have also been told that even after several months and many miles of wear they look new and good to people seeing me on my walks. Onward!
customer_reviews.author: Randy & Elissa

customer_reviews.title: Great for 12 hrs on concrete but hate glued in insoles! We
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes! He is on his feet for 12 hours at work on a concrete floor and these shoes help his feet, legs and back not hurt. I just wish the insoles weren’t glued in! I change his insoles every 3 months and getting the old glued in ones out was terribly difficult! I would’ve given a 5 star review if the insoles weren’t glued!
customer_reviews.author: Amy from NC

customer_reviews.title: First time buying sneakers online: Great experience
customer_reviews.text: I have stayed away from many clothes purchases online, especially for shoes. My larger, wider foot sometimes doesn't often fit well in what others consider a 12W. These Skechers were perfect. From the very first time I wore them my feet were happy. I am particularly fond of the sole. There are enough ridges and material to make for a comfortable experience. When it is time to replace the, I will order another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Lowry  Satisfying Retirement

customer_reviews.title: Look good and fit perfect.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look good and fit perfectly. One thing it seems I can count on is that if I buy Sketchers 12W the shoes are going to fit well. At least they have up to this point. They also appear well made and sturdy. Time will tell on the durability but if they wear like others Sketchers I have had then they will wear pretty good. Not great...but pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Maverick One

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe, fits true to size. Comfort is good and I have a hard time finding a shoe that doesn't hurt my right foot/ankle that was broken in 4 places. I have had 3 other name brand shoes that offered no support, only discomfort and pain but these actually support my foot/ankle great all day without leaving me in pain. I like them so much that I bought another pair in a different color and will be buying another color soon.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Shurts

customer_reviews.title: Husband LOVES these!
customer_reviews.text: My husband works construction, so he needs comfortable but tough shoes. He also has very wide feet, so finding shoes that fit can be difficult. He loves these and they last way longer than any of the other shoes we have tried. Will I buy again? I already have, he tells me when he needs a new pair and I order them again!
customer_reviews.author: HeatherA

customer_reviews.title: Fit is larger than other Skechers
customer_reviews.text: I have a bunch of skechers sneakers as they are extremely comfortable, and they are all size 8. However, this style fits noticeably larger than other skechers. It was enough if a difference to warrant returning them and ordering a 1/2 size down. Great shoes for the price as usual, but these do fit and feel slightly different than what you might be used to if you are a skechers fan.
customer_reviews.author: mkinpa

customer_reviews.title: Buy 1/2 size larger. Memory foam feels great.
customer_reviews.text: The memory foam feel is just right. This is a very comfortable fitting sneaker. So many brands out there just don't fit. Skechers really seem to get their fit right. This is now the 3rd pair of Skechers I've purchased and have been very happy with every pair i have owned. I will keep buying this brand. Buy a half size larger and you will be a very happy grasshopper.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I order these for my husband. He has been ...
customer_reviews.text: I order these for my husband. He has been having pain in his feet and was not able to get relief with other shoes. I order a half a size larger than he normally wears so he could put an extra insole in them and that seemed to do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Hearn

customer_reviews.title: So very comforatble
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable shoe brand on planet earth. I always get my size 10 U.S. in wide- 2-E. Like you're walking on a pillow. Bye Bye Nike
customer_reviews.author: Guitarstar

customer_reviews.title: The fit and being in a large size.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my grandson who wears a 16W shoe. Sizes that large are hard to find and tend to be pricey. They fit him well and he reports they are very comfortable. They are also a nice looking, well made shoe.
customer_reviews.author: T's Bee

customer_reviews.title: TRY IT. YOU MIGHT/MIGHT NOT LIKE IT
customer_reviews.text: The issue here was not the size, but rather that the architecture of my foot was not compatible with the cut of this shoe. My high instep did not match up with this shoe. The shoe, however, was handsomely designed and seemed well made, so don't let my experience dissuade you. Like Cinderella, you'll have to try on the shoe to see if you get your Prince. With Amazon Prime's free return policy, getting a divorce from this bad match was not a big hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Consumerzero

customer_reviews.title: I like Skechers, because they have their shoes in wide
customer_reviews.text: I like Skechers, because they have their shoes in wide, and I have wide feet. They provide an unbelievably comfortable fit. I put my shoes on and I was able to start walking. No break-in period. The shoes are comfortable and with their memory foam interior, every step is like walking on springs. I love my Skechers. I think others will as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bill E.

customer_reviews.title: Great for me in winter
customer_reviews.text: I am one that would ratchet just wear shoes in the snow and with the synthetic material these shoes are a good fit for me since I hate wear boots. Rather have cold feet as to sweating feet in boots. I will put boots on when snow is freshly falling and that is it. These shoes for me in the summer I don’t wear them as I go to a more cloth based shoe.
customer_reviews.author: wmah

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy their lighter shoes
customer_reviews.text: They are alright, I enjoy their lighter shoes. These are a little heavier than I thought they would be but I needed a shoe that had more ankle support. These give me more lateral support than their other light weight shoes, but they don't breath as well and your feet will sweat more than they would with their mesh fabric shoes. I think I'll like them more in the fall and winter months.
customer_reviews.author: B Whiteman

customer_reviews.title: Hard, Knobby Sole Make This a Turf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This isn't the shoe you might expect if you are a fan of Sketchers. These shoes do not have the usual Sketchers soft sole. The upper part of these shoes is hard and stiff. The sole is hard and stiff. The knobby tread is hard and stiff. These are not for pavement.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: ... reason the bottom of the shoe I gues was pretty worn out was especting at least 6-8 months out ...
customer_reviews.text: Well the shoes blew out at 5 months the back started poking my ankle then the ensoles wore out so I replaced the ensoles for know reason the bottom of the shoe I gues was pretty worn out was especting at least 6-8 months out of these after spending the extra cash for the Spartans and black on black and I used them for pretty much everything but my 20 dollar Walmart hikers lasted 6 months so never again
customer_reviews.author: Kunark38

customer_reviews.title: Be aware, they run large
customer_reviews.text: Not really the fault of the shoes themselves but more Sketchers. Why the heck can't manufacturers all size their products the same? These same size 11 shoes run a half size larger at least than my size 11 Saucony's did. In this day and age when brick and mortar stores are disappearing and everyone has to buy online, is it too much to ask they use standard sizes?
customer_reviews.author: Earl G.

customer_reviews.title: One thing I don't like
customer_reviews.text: Like everything about this shoe except for the soles. The heel part of the sole has a hole big enough to hold a 2" rock. Every time I go outside and come in house I have to dig rocks out of the heels.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes that seem to run a bit large.
customer_reviews.text: It seems like back in the day Sketchers where more an all out casual shoe but I really enjoy hiking in these. My last pair lasted better than any shoe I have had in the last 10 years. Defiantly check out size color and price option. Mine where 28 bucks for size 8 size 9 might be 75. And a big thanks to Sketchers for offering wide sizes!
customer_reviews.author: snapperhead

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but wears quickly
customer_reviews.text: The inside back heel area is coming apart after only a few months of use; these are not going to last a year. I don't know that I expected more; this was an experiment with Sketchers, coming from other more expensive brands with historically higher quality. I now know that if I want longer-term wear/quality, I need to consider other brands. The shoe is pretty comfortable otherwise, though, and nice and wide. If the material and construction quality was better, this could have been a good repeat purchase brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sigmabody

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and light weight shoe
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and light weight shoe. I wear a true size 14 and they are about as close as you can get. Unlike Nike or other mass produced shoes that seem to think an actual size 11 should be marketed as a size 14, Skechers hasn't ever disappointed. I work in a mostly desert area and the color is good for keeping a clearer appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves the support he gets from these shoes and wears them for several hours a day at work. In the past he would complain of leg and foot pain after a long days work and since we switched to Skechers footwear he doesn't have that issue. Good shoes.
customer_reviews.author: LilLouLou

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have never purchased a bad Skecher shoe. The person I purchased these for loves them. He said they fit perfectly, made well, and said the memory foam is so comfortable. I have Skechers with memory foam and being on my feet all day at work (12-14 hours ) I am very thankful for them.
customer_reviews.author: C.B.2

customer_reviews.title: I have a lot of trouble with my feet and the width has been great so I just wear two pairs of socks to ...
customer_reviews.text: Should have ordered a half size smaller but hard to know sometimes how a shoe will fit especially mens shoes. I have a lot of trouble with my feet and the width has been great so I just wear two pairs of socks to help with the size difference. Would buy again only a half size smaller
customer_reviews.author: Lightnings Angel

customer_reviews.title: A little narrow and not as comfortable as expected
customer_reviews.text: A little narrow and the arch feels like it's off just a touch. The cushion sole is nice but my feet hurt after wearing them for too long. All in all not a bad shoe but they seem like they're not made to fit right in certain parts.
customer_reviews.author: chad b

customer_reviews.title: The best for less!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many pairs of Skechers over the years. Good quality shoes at a reasonable price. Always fit and feel great. I have had these since the beginning of September 2018. I wear these almost everyday for work 9+ hours. They are fantastic. Best Skecher I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Right size
customer_reviews.text: My husband is short and has small feet. It's very difficult to find his size in men's shoes. He found a particular pair of Sketchers a couple years ago in a store and couldn't find them again until he looked on Amazon. Now I can just one-click on this item whenever he needs a pair. Always the right size and color.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Combes

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable well make sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable and well made attractive sneaker, great for walking, sports, etc. I thought this was slip on bungee fit, but was lace up. I wish the listing would specifically state this.
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These soles have memory foam inside and my husband loves them. He has plantar fasciitis and these shoes are really comfortable. Would rather order online when I know exactly what I want, as opposed to looking in stores.
customer_reviews.author: S. Elms

customer_reviews.title: Careful of foreign objects
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great, but as with nearly all Skechers you have to be aware of any foreign debris, like rocks, even tiny little rocks. They get below the insole, then destroy tit from below. You can't take out or replace the insole, so it just ruins the shoe. I got six months of use, but everything except the insole has another year or more.
customer_reviews.author: Warehouse

customer_reviews.title: They fit great and look great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. They fit great and look great. I love that they don't have mesh that will wear out and that they're water resistant because of that. The quality is good. I'm very pleased with these.
customer_reviews.author: debinut

customer_reviews.title: He simply loved the comfort of about 1/4-1/2" thick foam
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 12 year old, first I ordered size 9 2e first time trying the 2e wide size as we just realized the regular 9 were too narrow for him. He simply loved the comfort of about 1/4-1/2" thick foam, he also liked that the platform makes him look taller and I loved the quality and price. I did end up returning and replacing for a 9.5 2e to allow for a little more growing room, we are both happy.
customer_reviews.author: D1stkiss

customer_reviews.title: Fit great, but soles fail quickly
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair in 4 months, 1st pair the sole failed, had a flappy on the bottom. 2nd pair the sole failed at the edge. Not getting another pair. Will get a better brand as these are no good.
customer_reviews.author: B_dub

customer_reviews.title: Love the memory foam as well
customer_reviews.text: Only wear Skechers because of the widths. Love the memory foam as well. I used to get pain in my feet until switched over to Sketchers. I also found them to last longer. Good value when you catch on sale
customer_reviews.author: Bob N.

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfy shoe
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for my fiancé repeatedly! Lol he loves these shoes for work and will wear them into the ground. I then go onto amazon and repurchase them again. We’ve done this probably 5 times at least. They are a good sturdy shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley LaBelle

customer_reviews.title: Like walking on pillows!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for my husband, as his feet often hurt from long hours standing and walking. He can't stop talking about how comfortable these shoes are, and how great his feet feel. In fact, he purchased another pair of shoes, same brand but different style, because he is so happy with them. He purchased the wide width, and they fit him perfectly. Wonderful product!!
customer_reviews.author: SkyeWriter

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality shoe for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality shoe for the money. Well built, stylish, and comfortable.The only problem I had was the shoe was supposed to be black/navy combo. Actually it is black and dark grey. But I like it anyway! It also probably looks better than if it was black and navy.
customer_reviews.author: The 1

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I have really wide / congenitally flat feet so I usually have issues finding comfortable footwear. These are freakin awesome. Probably one of the top 2 most comfortable I've ever had for either casual wear or working out.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great sneaker holding up better than other sneakers I wear it always end up blowing now I wear them everyday work and outside around the house
customer_reviews.author: David G

customer_reviews.title: Best buy for big feet
customer_reviews.text: These are truly excellent shoes, especially for big-footed guys like me. The padding is incredibly comfortable, and the shoes fit like a glove. I couldn't ask for better!
customer_reviews.author: J. Scott Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Skechers have never disappointed me.
customer_reviews.text: The headline says it all. These new ones replace another pair that gave me good service for years They are well made and comfortable straight out of the box. My only minor gripe is the laces, which are already starting to wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Z

customer_reviews.title: Skechers has really gotten their act together they're making a great product
customer_reviews.text: fits well looks great use them for work and personal I really like what Skechers is doing. some of the prices of some of the other brands are out of sight it's getting ridiculous Skechers are moderately priced great product
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. Lowell

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy with the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Overall happy with the shoes. I wished that they were more breathable and lighter. I am hooked on the foam inserts but several other Skechers shoes have a softer insole than this pair. Styling and price are good.
customer_reviews.author: Bax

customer_reviews.title: VerY Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: A very good shoe. I work on concrete floors 8 to10 hrs a day. this is my 3rd pair. the shoe laces wear out before the shoe!! Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jr

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Skechers are quality. This is good for yardwork, hiking or walking dog. Takes nice impact on the heel too which I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are nice looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: They are nice looking shoes, but the label for the memory foam peels off under your foot. The memory foam doesn't last long, and for some reason, if i wear these for extended time, my left leg starts getting pains.
customer_reviews.author: David R Murison

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad shoe at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable with one caveat. The soles have a void under the heel that rocks get stuck in, can be quite painful until you remove it. My only gripe, otherwise good shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoes you'll ever wear.
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable shoes you'll ever wear. For about 2 weeks. After that you will hate these things. I never dreamed my feet could hurt so bad. They have very little arch and the memory foam breaks down very quickly leaving no support what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Stephan M. Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband for vacation. Wasn't sure how he would like them without being able to try them on. He really likes them, the fit is good and they are comfortable. The reason for 4 stars is they're not as lightweight as he would like.
customer_reviews.author: penny zuidema

customer_reviews.title: Nice while it lasts.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic part of the shoe behind your foot eventually breaks through the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: tomtom7

customer_reviews.title: Just be sure what you want
customer_reviews.text: The shoe strings were too "stretchy" hard to keep tied. Just did not fit my foot as expected. Probably my fault...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fit and Style
customer_reviews.text: These are the best looking sport shoes I have ever owned and they fit great. Highly recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Just The Facts

customer_reviews.title: Skechers are advertised
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Skechers wide with because they are fashionable and fit completely for a person needing wide with and long length. The toe cap has plenty of room .
customer_reviews.author: Chopper64

customer_reviews.title: I like Skechers
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery. I really like Sketchers shoes for wide feet. They just seem to fit better than so many others and usually outlast all the rest too. I believe they are a great purchase for their cost.
customer_reviews.author: PawPaw27284

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I own 6 pairs of Sketchers from flip flops, clogs, shoes to sneakers and I love the comfort and fit!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: no holes to let feet breathe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these - they fit good - and are comfortable to wear bur there your feet can breathe in them - you'll be throwing them out very quickly with the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Super nice value,  look pimp without paying!
customer_reviews.text: Such good value, I'm wearing my knockaround kitchen shoes and have these boxed up but they came pre tied perfectly and are perfect everyday/gym/sport shoes. Oh yeah big mens sizes as well, very rare! Remember Payless went EBay.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for a 30 Day Challenge I'm doing called #30DAYSTOCAIRO
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Though it's skewed contrast to what I had which was nothing. I bought these for a 30 Day Challenge I'm doing called #30DAYSTOCAIRO. I have already walked a few miles in these shoes and my feet and back feel great.
customer_reviews.author: A. N. J. Austin

customer_reviews.title: I like them, but I see a problem
customer_reviews.text: I like them, but I see a problem. If you walk in from the rain, be careful cause you will slip. Unlike my other Sketchers that are just fine when wet, you need to remember to walk carefully on tile floors...
customer_reviews.author: D. Sz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe all around. I use primarily for work. I wish I would’ve order about ten pairs when I purchased these only cause they are hard to find now
customer_reviews.author: James Maddox

customer_reviews.title: Good Choics for me
customer_reviews.text: inexpensive , well designed, Skecher quality shows...i am sure they will last
customer_reviews.author: Luis Torregrosa

customer_reviews.title: Best wide sneaker
customer_reviews.text: With room for orthopedic inserts. Fits the best of anything I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Are airy and comfortable. I have a funky knee and they help allow better control of how I walk.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur L. Libby

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Haven't worn them for very long but so far I find them very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: MikeJA

customer_reviews.title: Good but no as comfortable as other Skechers I have
customer_reviews.text: I buy only Skechers for the simple comfort. For some reason this pair is not as comfortable as the other shoes shown with this pair but in different color.
customer_reviews.author: John of Ft Worth

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews, FYI. Shoe fit fine and felt fine when purchased. I will say the shoe is VERY slippery on wet surfaces. This shoe only lasted 3 months for me. I wear them everyday for work, however the environment is not harsh. The failure is in the glued in insole. A lump developed right on the palm of my foot. I will not purchase again. Shoes should last longer than this. Terrible!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Thibeault

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes order a 1/2 size smaller
customer_reviews.text: I tried size 11 on in our local store too big and I always wear a size 11. The 10.5 fit just right, order a 1/2 size down in mens. Really comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Searay Boats

customer_reviews.title: Great Kicks!
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes. I have two pairs of Sketchers that are the same size. They fit perfectly. These are larger for some reason. 1/2 size down will be too small so I'll make them work with 2 pairs of socks. Very well built, comfortable, and great looking.
customer_reviews.author: John F

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th pair of Sketcher shoes. They are consisently comfortable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Molon Labe 5.56

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fit is good, I should have gotten narrower size. That's on me, still comfortable tho.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Fit on the large side
customer_reviews.text: The fit is 1/2 size larger and is certainly wider, but still fit well enough for weight training. The sole is firm with just enough give.
customer_reviews.author: TIY

customer_reviews.title: Just after 2months i started seeing the issues, The upper layer from top started coming off
customer_reviews.text: Just after 2months i started seeing the issues, The upper layer from top started coming off. Looks like it was not pasted properly. It started coming off within 2months.. Writing this little late, as there was no way to return after 2months, so didnt wrote it. Thought of giving a feedback on this.
customer_reviews.author: Rishi Kumar Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are extremely comfortable, and a definite upgrade to my previous pair (Skechers Sport w/Memory Foam). I'll definitely be back for more, and I'm already looking for a pair for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H.

customer_reviews.title: Wide!
customer_reviews.text: I really like Sketchers. the toe box is large and the last size seems designed to accommodate people in America, not like these narrow lasts that are used in China. One star less because they were rather pricey.
customer_reviews.author: spork

customer_reviews.title: I love the skechers look and comfort but my sparta memory ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the skechers look and comfort but my sparta memory foams came with one shoe string about 5 or 6 inches shorter then the other . I will buy another pair with or without shoestrings the best I ever had. jch
customer_reviews.author: Jim C. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Most confortable shoes ever.
customer_reviews.text: Don't think I will buy any other, from now on it is all Skechers.
customer_reviews.author: William E. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoe. Flawed design
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have a major design flaw. About have way up the lacing there is a fabric loop. After several months that loop breaks from wear. I'm my case they only lasted 4 months. I've bought these shoes 3 times in the past and each one has failed in the same place. They're comfortable shoes but I won't buy them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is comfortable, but the laces are hard to tighten
customer_reviews.author: Thomas McMeeken

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and comfortable shoes. They have cushion and they are great for walking. At first, they may feel different when you walk with them but after 1-2 days they will adjust to your feet. I will buy another for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Great Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Great sneakers. I've wore Sketchers for a while now. They fit and ware well. These are no different. They have good arch support and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey S. Davis

customer_reviews.title: memory foam insole gets holes in the heel area
customer_reviews.text: They the memory foam insole wears out and gets holes in the heel area after about six months. I’ve gone through two pairs in less than a year
customer_reviews.author: Joe W.

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe on the market for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes they make. I have 4 pairs and the oldest is now 10 years old and they are still not worn out! Can't say that for 1 year old nikes......
customer_reviews.author: Ross Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice supportive cushioned shoe
customer_reviews.text: Feel great! Very supportive nice, thick sole. Glad I purchased fuel-efficient reasonably priced. I'm on my feet a lot at work and they kept my feet comfortable and cushioned!
customer_reviews.author: perry ander

customer_reviews.title: Awesome experience
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order shows online. For the first time, they feel great
customer_reviews.author: Mike

product_meta.title: Skechers Mens Sparta Tr Blue Size: 14 2E US
product_meta.description: Core sneaker with air cooled memory foam
